ComicInfo.Title: All Apologies
ComicInfo.Summary:
Oscar Gomez is on the hunt for a Syndicate deserter hiding out in the year 1994. Can he rely on the local Syndicate network to track the deserter down?
This standalone story features art by series co-creator DECLAN SHALVEY!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------------------------------|-------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Declan Shalvey | 1-2 | | B | Cover B | David O'Sullivan | 3 | | C | 1:20 Retailer Incentive Cover C | Michael Del Mundo | 4 |
